# Release v0.1.0

## Highlights

- Initial release of pivoteer.
- Core XML engine for surgical worksheet updates.
- Table resizing logic to keep ListObjects aligned with injected data.
- Pivot cache refresh flag handling.
- PyPI-ready packaging with CI and compliance artifacts.

## Artifacts

- Source distribution: `pivoteer-0.1.0.tar.gz`
- Wheel: `pivoteer-0.1.0-py3-none-any.whl`
